website_summaries.verdict: Once it's properly assembled, this patio heater nicely heats up the surrounding area.
pros: A strong heat output and heavy-duty construction easily separate this heater from the rest
cons: Not as effective in slight to moderate wind

customer_reviews.title: Great Heat, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than the last big box store heater I bought. Upgraded to this unit and I am not disappointed. Bought two and assembled both in less than 2 hours. Only the heat reflector assembly is slightly difficult. I recommend buying the larger one piece reflector as it spreads the heat out much further. It’s certainly a little extra, but well worth it. The unit itself heats up quickly and is easy to start with the electronic ignition. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was that the cover for the tank should have hand holds higher for easier lifting. But a minor inconvenience given that you don’t have to lift it very often.
customer_reviews.author: JROC74

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy top Aluminum heat reflectoe breaks off in mild wind.
customer_reviews.text: This patio heater is better constructed than your average Lowes/home depot models. I was looking for a stainless steel version not soft Aluminum. However this unit is mostly stainless steel, except for the top heat reflector which is cheap and flimsy aluminum. So after a few days outside flexing in the wind, the top flimsy week soft aluminum fails and actually breaks off. Now after the first week its not even useable. Very bad design. I will be contacting the manufacturer for a fix, but probably will be pushing this to the curb on bulk garbage day. Dont waist your money. Find a patio heater with a sainless steel top heat deflector that can withstand some mild wind.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Loiacono

customer_reviews.title: It does the job and it will not rust.
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with this purchase. Every step of the instructions were clear including wheel assembly. Very stable especially with a full 20 lb. tank of LP gas installed. I bought a cover for winter protection. I am just tall enough at 6’2” to get it on without a step ladder. Remember how big this is. The wheels make moving it around a patio a piece of cake but you are not going to put it under your arm and put it in the garage for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Bill L

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Chinese Engineering. Engineered to Fail Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Six months in, the shaft for for gas control was so corroded that it froze up. I had to us a pry bar to remove the plastic knob, then several applications of Kriol, a pair of pliers and a hammer to unfreeze the shaft of the gas control. This is an example of a crap product engineered to fail. Whatever you pay for this product should be regarded as a rental fee, because you will not recover much when you scrap it for recycling in the metal value. There must be some other company that can produce a product which can remain functional for more than six months, but not this company.
customer_reviews.author: PracticalBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Good but difficult
customer_reviews.text: I want to say overall the heater is good, much better then any other heaters you can find in amazon. if you are looking for an extremely easy heater to operate then this is the obvious choice, However, when it comes to warranty and quality assurance, This company put extra efforts to avoid warranty, Give you the run around when parts fail. also, they literally put wrong parts in my package and shipped out a defected head unit that didn't work at all. i do love the heater when it works but it has some major flaws. would i buy it again ? yes, just because there is no appropriate competitor in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Puts out a lot of heat for outdoor pool area. Looks nice (stainless steel).
customer_reviews.text: The unit looks great and produces quite a lot of heat for outdoor pool area. The second day I had it outside, a gust of wind (10 mph) blew it over (partially into pool which cushioned the blow), but a lot of the stainless steel was bent up. This was with a fill tank of propane weighing it down. Trying to figure out how to weight it down even more so I don't have to move it inside after every use.
customer_reviews.author: William M. White

customer_reviews.title: Not that great but not many options otherwise
customer_reviews.text: OK at best. Not as good of quality as I expected. Head unit and assembly seems cheap. The head unit is crooked and cannot be fixed by adjustment, so much so that there is a noticeably diagonal burn line on the unit. Heat is OK within 4-5 feet, especially if you are standing. I don't think it directs heat downward very well, nor do i think the heat output is great - but my expectations may have been too much here. I do really like the wheels assembly for moving it. And yes, the instructions are not the best but you will figure it out eventually.
customer_reviews.author: no_uh

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in August so have not had cold weather yet to test the unit. Assembly took 2 hours, some instructions were vague but once assembled, the unit appears sturdy and well made. It moves easily with attached wheels. Did a test firing up and it lit easily. Will know more when the cold weather returns.
customer_reviews.author: rootdr

customer_reviews.title: Fast reliable start. Powerful
customer_reviews.text: So far, a reliable, dependable, quick start up, which has been the bane of our existence with previous heaters. It looks great, and puts out serious heat, much more than our earlier heaters. The lifetime warranty was a large part of our decision, love it, but hope never to need it!
customer_reviews.author: Montefuego

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We researched patio heaters for a while, and based on consumer reviews this was one of the best options. The reviews were not wrong. We love this heater and will probably get another one shortly. Easy to assemble. Gas tank lasts for a while, however that is subject to how often it is used.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Check connections before assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Halfway thru assembly found that hole in top of tank cover was smaller than diameter of pole that is supposed to go through it. Major fail. No way to put together unless you are good at metal fabrication and can widen the tank cover hole.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I would like a replacement regulator
customer_reviews.text: When I assembled and tested the unit, I discovered that the LP gas regulator was defective. Thankfully I had another unit to swap out the regulator to determine that was the problem. After cannibalizing another heater for a regulator, the heater does work well. I would like a replacement regulator but I am unsure how to request it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Clark

customer_reviews.title: Far superior to the competition
customer_reviews.text: An excellent value for the cost. It out performs any of the other brands we’ve owned over the years, I’d highly recommend this manufacturer and model.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Patio Heater
customer_reviews.text: Manual was easy to follow and the parts were organized on a sheet and clearly identified. All the stainless components were in perfect condition. Ignited first time and generates a bundle of heat. I added the optional single piece dome for additional heat coverage and looks (versus the five piece dome assemble that's standard)
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Free

customer_reviews.title: Defective unit. Working with manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Have loved this product for years but the new one doesn’t work. Will update review after I receive the new part.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Fire Sense Customer Service is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with dents in base and hood. Called Fire Sense three times to replace only dented pieces, emailed photos, to no avail. No help at all from Fire Sense customer service, not even a reply. However AMAZON CUSTOMER SERVICE stood by their reputation and replaced it with a non-dented unit. Assembly was only difficult with the wheel unit. Appears to be well constructed. Have not used it yet due to weather.
customer_reviews.author: Donna W.

customer_reviews.title: Good solid heater, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I found this heater to be easy to assemble and it puts out a good amount of heat. I think it's a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality material but parts don’t fit correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product but the tank cover doesn’t fit over the post in the one that was sent. A support ticket was created but the seller is very slow to respond. I would be hesitant to recommend based on this issue unless they finally do take some action to resolve the defective product issue.
customer_reviews.author: Rob L

customer_reviews.title: Very well Built and Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Very well Built and Works Great, I purchased the Upgraded Reflector and it works awesome. Great Lifetime warranty on parts !!
customer_reviews.author: RES

customer_reviews.title: Great heater.
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Sturdy. Great heat. It took me a little over an hour to assemble. The instructions were fine except for the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: john m mc gregor

customer_reviews.title: If you like HOT&FAST look no further!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was rather simple to assemble, I sprung for the larger heat reflector (Fire Sense 61437) in my opinion it's a must. I am having an issue with a gas leak @ the coupler, I will reach out to Amazon and let all of you know how I made out. Other than that it works fine, and I would definitely recommend it.👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sherman Sandmans Co

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money, falls apart
customer_reviews.text: A pain to set up... also, the ignite button broke within the first month of using it.
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: Amazing heaters
customer_reviews.text: Quality is excellent. While I haven’t had very long so far so good. Easy assembly. I purchased the optional top cover to give larger heating area
customer_reviews.author: eric koeppel

customer_reviews.title: Very Noisy
customer_reviews.text: This puts out a lot of heat, but is extremely noisy and frankly a little scary. It you turn up the heat halfway, flames start spilling out past the grate and the thing sounds like a jet engine. Most likely better patio heaters out there. Beware
customer_reviews.author: Steve Libby

customer_reviews.title: Assembled way to cheap. Falls apart !
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months the bolts came out that hold this heater upright and it fell over and now my unit is bent and I paid 300 dollars for it and looks like crap
customer_reviews.author: Robby Aoude

customer_reviews.title: good looking patio heater
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble and works well. Saw this heater at Costco and almost bought it. Found it on Amazon for $50 less. stainless steel appears to be good quality, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: vi perkins

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Diameter of the post is larger than the opening in the tank housing. Super frustrating to get halfway through assembly to find the parts don’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Loren S.

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Have only used once so far. The welding quality and surface finish for some of the internal (hidden) components is not great, but not a big deal given that it is hidden behind the polished stainless covers.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer ABC

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: So far this thing works as advertised. Put it together in an hour - it's good to have a metric ratchet set - that helped immensely - and all the pieces were there. Got it started up first try (ok, 2nd, I didn't realize you had to push the handle down) and it works well. Not super hot, but I guess that's more a function of radiant heat outside than a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: ErikB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, clear assembly instructions, and I was glad to get a great deal. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Marge Davis

customer_reviews.title: while the overall design is fine the problem is with connecting the wheels to the ...
customer_reviews.text: while the overall design is fine the problem is with connecting the wheels to the base. when you attach the wheels to the base the weight cracks and the wheels will not tighten. I managed to fix this by adding large washers to the back however the metal flexes a bit too much when moving the heater.
customer_reviews.author: Jonal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the third outdoor heater we have and the best quality by far. Easy to assemble and more heavy duty than some of our others.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Clawson III

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have had several outdoor heaters and this one is the best we've ever ordered and it has a lifetime guarantee! It lights easily and looks very upscale
customer_reviews.author: Peachesandprincess

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be well made, however customer technical support misses the mark
customer_reviews.text: The item seems well made, but putting it together will take an hour or more. Some instructions did not match what was included in the box or what really needed to be done. Calling the seller for customer or technical support is poor. Can’t reach a real live body, and you have to leave a message. Even with that they say they will return your call in 24 hours, which they did not do. Although the patio heater is built well and does the job, i’m Not sure if I would recommend Fire Sense to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to start. Seems very well made. Was not difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best score of the year. Use it every morning for outside breakfast and every night for drinks.
customer_reviews.author: joseph calamia

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these. One came with parts missing ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One came with parts missing. Attempts to get them have completely failed. I was told by their customer service that the warehouse would call back within 24 hours, but two weeks later they haven't called. Calling back to customer service put me in another 24 hour call back promise. That 24 hours has come and gone as well. The one with full parts is working very well though.
customer_reviews.author: cvcanada

product_meta.title: Fire Sense Stainless Steel Pro Series Patio Heater with Wheels | Uses 20 Pound Propane Tank | 46,000 BTU Output | Weighted Base | Portable Outdoor Heat Lamp
product_meta.description:
Enjoy your patio in all seasons with this Pro Series Stainless Steel Patio Heater with Wheels by Fire Sense.

This outdoor patio heater spreads the heat all around you so that you can easily enjoy being outdoors even during chilly weather. It will effortlessly keep you and your loved ones warm and toasty so that you do not have to stay indoors.

The propane heater features an electronic ignition system that will turn on the heater in an instant so that you do not have to wait around for the air around you to be heated. Also, this way you only use the fuel you need. This gas patio heater uses a 20 pound LP gas cylinder which is not included with your purchase and produces a heat output of 46,000 BTU. This propane tank will last you approximately 10 hours.

The heavy duty convenient wheels allow you to easily navigate and position this propane patio heater in the perfect spot for your outdoor entertainment. This outdoor propane heater for patio also comes with a weighted base and a tip over protection system so you do not have to worry about the heater accidentally falling over. We also provide a generous defective parts replacement warranty so you can buy this heater without any reservation.

This Fire Sense patio heater is the perfect solution for any outdoor gatherings you want to have during the winters.
feature_bullets: This outdoor patio heater is made using heavy duty stainless steel
This stainless steel patio heater features wheels for easy portability.
The portable heater makes use of a standard 20 pound LPG propane tank.
You can turn on this patio heater in an instant with the push of a button.
This outdoor heater is perfect for your porch or any other outdoor venue.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars72 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
